price: Isso, porque odeiam o que Allah fez descer. Então, Ele lhes anulará as obras.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ كَرِهُواْ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ فَأَحۡبَطَ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-annahum karihū mā anzala al-lahu fa-aḥbaṭa aʿmālahum
